amendment.description: Expressing the sense of the Senate on Armed Forces Radio and Television Service programming.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3316 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3316 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S6719) Expressing the sense of the Senate on Armed Forces Radio and Television Service programming.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3316 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3316 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Harkin.
